title: Pets are welcome at IMT Deerfield! 2 bd / 2 ba. Call for tour!
posting_body: ['IMT Deerfield', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '13125 Morris Road', 'Alpharetta, GA 30004', 'show contact info', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'IMT Deerfield provides luxury apartment living in Northeast Alpharetta.', 'There is something for everyone at IMT Deerfield, including a wide range of amenities.', 'Enjoy modern upgrades like garden-style oval tubs and private patios and balconies.', 'With three resort-style pools, two lighted tennis courts, and a car care center, our apartment homes at IMT Deerfield are unparalleled in the prestigious Alpharetta neighborhood.', 'Conveniently located near many shops and restaurants in Alpharetta, you will find that the lifestyle you desire is right outside your front door when you live at IMT Deerfield.', 'Come home to luxury living..', 'Come home to IMT Deerfield.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>', 'Bedrooms: 2 |  Bathrooms:  2', 'Square Footage: 1214 - 1266 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1935/Month', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '➢ BBQ Area', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Dog Park', '➢ Emergency Maintenance', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Gated Access', '➢ Intrusion Alarm Available', '➢ Playground', '➢ Tennis Court(s)', '➢ 24-Hour Package Lockers', '➢ 6,000 Sq.', 'Ft. State-of-the-Art Fitness Center', "➢ Children's Playground", '➢ Excellent School System', '➢ Executive Business Center', '➢ My IMT Resident Portal', '➢ Online Resident Services: utilities connection, rent payment', '➢ On-Site Clothes Care Center', '➢ Resident Clubhouse', '➢ Valet Trash Service', 'This Unit Comes With:', '➢ Built-in Microwaves and Dishwashers', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Crown Molding Accents', '➢ Fully Equipped Kitchens with Stainless Steel Appliances', '➢ Garden-Style Oval Tub', '➢ Granite Countertops', '➢', 'In-Home Washers & Dryers', '➢ LED Lighting', '➢ Trey Ceilings In Select Homes', '➢ Wood-Style Flooring Throughout', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Phone-Number:', 'show contact info', 'Pet-Policy: No weight restriction.', 'Some breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our Leasing Center for complete Pet Policy information.', 'Lease-Length: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Please call for driving directions.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'E6DA30D3E1FE455']
